project_info.title: Health Army Volunteers: Transformando Tecnologia em Impacto Social

outline.title: Health Army Volunteers: Transformando Tecnologia em Impacto Social
outline.summary: Visão geral da plataforma e objetivos alcançados na Sprint 2. Desenvolvido por Shirley Brito.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/lM0VmFJyEZwV.jpg - The title slide needs a strong visual that combines healthcare and technology. Image 1 is a clean, modern background with "HEALTHCARE" text and a subtle tech/network pattern, which fits the theme of "Transformando Tecnologia em Impacto Social".

outline.title: Arquitetura Moderna Garante Performance e Segurança de Dados
outline.summary: Detalhamento da stack tecnológica: React 19, tRPC, Supabase e RLS.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/BZalon62b0rl.jpg - This slide discusses modern architecture, frontend/backend, and database technology (React, tRPC, Supabase). Image 7 is an abstract representation of a digital network or circuit board with integrated medical icons, symbolizing the technical architecture.

outline.title: Gestão Dinâmica de Voluntários e Disponibilidade Flexível
outline.summary: Funcionalidades de cadastro, edição e sistema de agenda flexível.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/3Msvpt5sjPjH.jpg - This slide focuses on volunteer management, registration, and scheduling. Image 5 is a simple, clean icon representing people/volunteers with medical crosses, which directly relates to the "Health Army Volunteers" and their management.

outline.title: Otimização para Deploy e Estabilidade do Sistema
outline.summary: Melhorias de infraestrutura, correção de bugs e prontidão para Vercel.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/AVhsEDDLoswX.jpg - This slide discusses optimization, stability, and deployment (Vercel, Sonner). Image 2 is a dark blue abstract background with a heartbeat line and hexagonal patterns, suggesting stability, monitoring, and high-tech performance, which is suitable for system optimization.

outline.title: Roadmap Estratégico: O Futuro do Health Army
outline.summary: Próximos passos: Integração com Google Agenda (Prioridade 0) e escala global.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/GSLXktGdxbMx.jpg - The roadmap slide discusses future features like impact metrics, smart matching, and global scale. Image 8 is a dynamic, futuristic visual with various medical and tech icons (brain, heart, DNA) in a hexagonal pattern, representing strategic vision and future growth/impact.
